title: FUBAR DiskFiller 2013 v2
description:
FUBAR DiskFiller 2013 v2
------------------------

Here comes another version of this really annoying, and potential harmful, application.

As always, there will be 2 warnings upon installation. You cannot install this by mistake!

After installation, Windows will be shut down, and UAC (Windows User Account Control) will be disabled.

Next time, and every time, any user logs into Windows, this application will launch, running invisible in the background, and create 10 completely random and useless files in EVERY folder on all harddisks.
Nothing more will happen.

Each of these newly created files, will have a random name, and consist of 1MB of completely useless data.

Over time, a lot of files will be created.....


As always, here is how to remove it:
- Boot up in safe-mode.
- Open the Registry-Editor (regedit.exe).
- Browse to this key:
  HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE/Software/Microsoft/Windows/CurrentVersion/Run
- And delete the value named "FUBAR DiskFiller 2013 v2".


/Ubehage
